dependencies.description:
Simple library for color and formatting to terminal Very simple Python
library for color and formatting in terminal. Collection of color codes
and names for 256 color terminal setups. The following is a list of 256
colors for Xterm, containing an example of the displayed color, Xterm
Name, Xterm Number and HEX.
dependencies.name: py-colored

dependencies.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.
dependencies.name: py-pillow

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description: A pure Python implementation of a trie data structure.
dependencies.name: py-pygtrie

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Cross platform GUI toolkit for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wxpython

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Turn (almost) any command line program into a full GUI application with
one line
name: py-gooey

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
